co2Values.comment:
co2-calculation: Assumption: like wheat grains global value (1) + parboiling value is similar to that of rice (2). 
Parboiling of rice causes an increase of 3% in global warming potential (2)

0.85 (1) *1.03 (2) = 0.8755 calculation-process-documentation: made from the groats of different cereals, most often from durum wheat. Groats include everything: the hull, the germ and the endosperm -> grinding of whole grains (3), thus no separation of the bran, germ and endosperm. Grinding without separation stage at the mill. 
Bulghur is parboiled and cut durum wheat groats (3)

Currently no milling stage included.
